name: feature-inventory
description: Reverse-engineers every feature across codebases using Agent Teams, then generates implementation-ready plans for your target architecture

plugins.name: feature-inventory
plugins.description: Reverse-engineers every feature across codebases using Agent Teams for parallel analysis, then generates implementation-ready plans with TDD stubs and self-contained section files. Includes feature inventory, gap analysis, and plan generation. REQUIRES Agent Teams enabled.
